data.title: Haim Saban
data.meta_description: Haim Saban (/səˈbɑːn/; born October 15, 1944) is an Israeli-American media proprietor, investor, musical composer and producer of records, film, and television. He is the founder of Saban Entertainment, producer and distributor of children's television programs in the US such as Power Rangers. He headed up consortiums which purchased the broadcasters ProSiebenSat.1 Media and Univision Communicatio...
